text: When developing a game plan for a specific opponent, what is the MOST crucial initial step?

options.text: Focusing solely on your fighter's strongest techniques.
Detailed film study of the opponent to identify patterns, strengths, and weaknesses.
Assuming the opponent will fight exactly like their last three opponents.
Prioritizing cardiovascular conditioning above all else.

feedback: Effective game planning starts with a thorough analysis of the opponent to tailor strategies effectively.
source_reference: Advanced Coaching Manual - Chapter on Competition Strategy

text: Which physiological principle is most directly associated with 'peaking' an athlete for a competition?
feedback: Supercompensation refers to the body's adaptation to stress, where, after a period of training and recovery, performance capacity can exceed baseline levels, which is the goal of peaking.
source_reference: Advanced Coaching Manual - Chapter on Periodization and Peaking
